title: How to Do a Wheelie in Need for Speed: ProStreet

steps.title: Use a RWD car with very high HP.
steps.content: Use a RWD car with very high HP. Try the Shelby GT500 (the one that costs 42,000).

steps.title: Install all level 3 parts, the lower the aero the better 2 max, And add some N20.
steps.content: Install all level 3 parts, the lower the aero the better 2 max, And add some N20. Stage 4 parts are not a must, but can make doing a longer wheelie easier. Make sure you set your rear suspensions to soft and the front suspensions to stiff. The lower the aerial the better 2 max.

steps.title: Warm up your tires.
steps.content: Warm up your tires. Green marks the optimal rpm.

steps.title: Get a score of good or better.
steps.content: Get a score of good or better. Of course, max grip is the best but not a must. If you're going to break your record try getting max grip, again, for those few extra ft.

steps.title: Feel the rhythm of the orange lights so you can predict the green light.
steps.content: Feel the rhythm of the orange lights so you can predict the green light. It works like a charm. Launch

steps.title: Use N20 when your front wheels start coming back down (this will be around the 3rd gear).
steps.content: Use N20 when your front wheels start coming back down (this will be around the 3rd gear).
